events.title: Highest Education Level
events.content: Master's in Social Welfare and Doctoral course completion in Urban Development Management from Hanyang University.

events.title: Three-Term Mayor of Seongdong District
events.content: Serving as the three-term Mayor of Seongdong District, with the current term spanning 2022-2026.

events.title: Expertise in Urban Planning & Local Administration
events.content: Recognized expert in urban planning and local administration, demonstrated through policy work and leadership.

events.title: Pioneering Policy Implementation
events.content: Led initiatives like textbook-featured gentrification prevention, smart city solutions, and essential worker support.

events.title: Leadership in Governance Associations
events.content: Chairman of Association for Gentrification Prevention, Advisor to Seoul Mayors' Association, etc.

events.title: High Marks for Pledge Fulfillment
events.content: Received 'SA' grade (excellent) in the 2023 national manifesto evaluation for pledge implementation.

events.title: Expertise in Urban Development Studies
events.content: Mentioned as having interest and expertise in urban development management, having studied doctoral courses.

events.title: Smart City Initiatives & Awards
events.content: Implemented smart city initiatives like smart shelters and crosswalks, leading to OECD and design awards.

events.title: Nationally Recognized Gentrification Policy
events.content: Gentrification prevention policy featured in high school textbooks; pioneered 'Gentrification Prevention Act'.

events.title: Policy Proposals on Urban Redevelopment
events.content: Actively making policy proposals, such as publicizing the transfer of urban redevelopment rights to local governments.
